name: Lot of 5 Miscellaneous Pre-Recorded VHS Tapes
description:
Lot of 5 Miscellaneous Pre-Recorded VHS Tapes
268.000₫
This lot includes 5 pre-recorded VHS tapes of various brands and lengths, with potential recordings of television broadcasts, movies or home recordings — or they may be blank. Since they are untested, their contents remain a mystery, making them a great find for anyone looking to digitize lost footage from the VHS era, or anyone who just needs tapes to use as blanks for personal projects.
Additional Information:
Includes 5 pre-recorded VHS tapes
Various brands (TDK, Scotch, Kodak, Memorex, etc.)
Various recording lengths (T-120, T-160, etc.)
Untested – may contain recorded content or be blank
Perfect for archiving, collecting or re-recording
Sold as-is. No guarantees on playback quality or recorded content.
Please note that the product photos are intended to show an example of what you may receive. The tapes you receive will be similar but will vary in brands, content and label markings.

These beautiful tapes come from our friends at VHS is LIFE, procurers of many exciting options for blank VHS tapes, and the official inventor of the Mold Cleaner.

E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial (1982) is a sci-fi family film directed by Steven Spielberg and starring Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore and Dee Wallace. The film follows a young boy who befriends a stranded alien and helps it return home while evading government agents. Known for its emotional storytelling, iconic imagery and John Williams' memorable score, this film remains a beloved classic for audiences of all ages.

name: Polaroid SX-70 Original Chrome Instant Camera
description:
Polaroid SX-70 Original Chrome Instant Camera
10.151.000₫
Consider Enhancing Your Experience with a 600 Film Conversion
SX-70 cameras were originally designed to use SX-70 film, which has a sensitivity rating of ISO 160/23°. This is a pretty slow film speed, which is desirable for fine grain. However, it can be limiting in low-light settings. 600 film is twice as sensitive (ISO 640/29° to be exact!) which will perform better in a variety of light situations and is more readily available at big box stores like Target. More than half of customers upgrade to 600. Learn more about the process here.
Specs:
Film: Polaroid SX-70 instant film
Lens: 116mm f/8
Focus: Manual, 10.4" - ∞
Viewfinder: Single lens reflex (SLR)
Exposure Control: Automatic, with manual +/- 1EV lighten/darken wheel
Shutter Release: Electronic, automatic shutter speeds of 1/175 to 14 seconds
Flash: External flash bar socket
Battery: Built into each film cartridge
Our process:
This is a genuine piece of vintage retro tech refurbished and restored by OldieZone . Our process includes:
Deconstructing the camera to its base components
Verifying the form and function of each piece
Repairing and replacing pieces whenever necessary, but also...
Retaining original pieces whenever reasonably possible
Cleaning all optical and viewing components including lenses and fresnels
Polishing exterior components
Applying new genuine leather replacement coverings
Packaging each camera in a specially made box
90-day warranty:
Authentic Vintage, Guaranteed to Work
This camera has experienced decades of life before finding its way to OldieZone . As such, it will show some signs of past use and may vary ever so slightly from what is pictured. However, we are extremely picky about the condition of the cameras we restore and the parts we select for the repair process. The end result is an excellent vintage restoration that is guaranteed to work properly. Should any questions arise, we have a team of friendly people ready to help you.
This camera is covered by the OldieZone Refurbished guarantee. [view our 90-day limited warranty]

name: Polaroid 600 Sun660 Autofocus Instant Film Camera
description:
Polaroid 600 Sun660 Autofocus Instant Film Camera
(136)
4.794.000₫
Capture unforgettable moments with the Polaroid Sun660, featuring innovative (for the 1980s) Sonar Autofocus technology for sharp, instant results. This iconic camera combines the fast-developing 600 film with automatic ultrasonic focus, making it easy to shoot portraits, candid moments and lower-light scenes with confidence. The built-in flash ensures great exposure in most settings, while its durable, compact design makes it perfect for on-the-go adventures.
Specs:
Lens: 110mm f/10
Focus: SonarAutofocus, 3' - Infinity
Viewfinder: Direct
Exposure Control: Automatic, with manual +/- 1EV lighten/darken slider
Shutter: Electronic, automatic shutter speeds of 1/3 to 1/200th second
Flash: Built-in, with manual override
Power: Battery is built into film cartridge
Our process:
OldieZone carefully refurbishes every Polaroid camera by hand from the inside out. Each camera is cleaned, serviced and tested to ensure complete functionality to deliver a reliable instant photography experience.
What is vintage refurbished?
Due to the vintage nature of this product, the camera will show signs of a previous life. These cameras had slight variations to the label next to the flash and above the film shield based on the year it came out, and certain features may differ slightly from what is shown in photos.
Warranty:
Limited 90-day warranty

name: Polaroid 600 Malibu Barbie Instant Film Camera
description:
Polaroid 600 Malibu Barbie Instant Film Camera
(75)
4.794.000₫
Capture the essence of sun-soaked adventures with the officially licensed Malibu Barbie Polaroid instant film camera. Inspired by the carefree spirit of the California coast, this vibrant pink camera boasts a newly-molded exterior that channels the iconic Malibu Barbie aesthetic. Whether you're snapping beachside memories or everyday moments, this stylish camera is the perfect companion for your adventures. Combining refurbished vintage Polaroid components with a fresh, bold design, it delivers the nostalgia of instant photography with a modern touch.
This Polaroid 600 instant film camera is powered by the batteries included in each pack of Polaroid 600 film (sold separately), making it easy to load and start shooting right away.
Enjoy an exclusive sticker sheet with over two dozen high-quality decals, so you can create the camera of your California dreams.
Specs:
Lens: 110mm f/10
Focus: Fixed, 4' - Infinity
Viewfinder: Direct
Exposure Control: Automatic, with manual +/- 1EV lighten/darken slider
Shutter: Electronic, automatic shutter speeds of 1/3 to 1/200th second
Flash: Built-in, with manual override
Power: Battery is built into film cartridge
Our process:
This camera features a freshly-molded exterior designed and built by OldieZone , combined with carefully selected refurbished vintage Polaroid internal components from the 80s and 90s. By reusing vintage components, we not only preserve the authentic instant photography experience but also promote sustainability by preventing electronic waste. Our meticulous refurbishment process ensures that every camera is thoroughly cleaned, serviced and tested to deliver a reliable instant photography experience.
90-day warranty:
Authentic Vintage, Guaranteed to Work
This camera has experienced decades of life before finding its way to OldieZone . As such, it will show some signs of past use and may vary ever so slightly from what is pictured. However, we are extremely picky about the condition of the cameras we restore and the parts we select for the repair process. The end result is an excellent vintage restoration that is guaranteed to work properly. Should any questions arise, we have a team of friendly people ready to help you.
This camera is covered by the OldieZone Refurbished guarantee. [view our 90-day limited warranty]

name: Polaroid 600 Hello Kitty Strawberry Kawaii Instant Film Camera
description:
Polaroid 600 Hello Kitty Strawberry Kawaii Instant Film Camera
(46)
4.794.000₫
Smooth and sweet like a strawberry milkshake — this delectable Polaroid 600 instant film camera is Hello Kitty at her most scrumptious. Created by OldieZone and Sanrio as part of their beloved retro tech collection, every piece from the Strawberry Kawaii series features a clean white and pink palette with official Hello Kitty artwork and charming details, including phrases such as “Hello Kitty” and “Kawaii” set in Japanese hiragana characters.
This camera combines refurbished vintage Polaroid internal components from the 80s and 90s with a freshly-molded exterior designed and built by OldieZone . Enjoy the classic instant photography experience with modern reliability, all while contributing to sustainability by giving new life to vintage parts.

Celebrate the 50th anniversary of the Beagle Scouts' first appearance in the Peanuts comic strip with this officially licensed Polaroid instant film camera. Featuring Snoopy and his crew of eager outdoor explorers, this camera is perfect for capturing your own adventures in an instant. It combines refurbished vintage Polaroid internal components from the 80s and 90s with a freshly-molded exterior designed and built by OldieZone . Enjoy the classic instant photography experience with modern reliability, all while contributing to sustainability by giving new life to vintage parts.
This Polaroid 600 instant film camera is powered by the batteries included in each pack of Polaroid 600 film (sold separately), making it easy to load and start shooting right away.
Specs:
Lens: 110mm f/10
Focus: Fixed, 4' - Infinity
Viewfinder: Direct
Exposure Control: Automatic, with manual +/- 1EV lighten/darken slider
Shutter: Electronic, automatic shutter speeds of 1/3 to 1/200th second
Flash: Built-in, with manual override
Power: Battery is built into film cartridge
Our process:
This camera features a freshly-molded exterior designed and built by OldieZone , combined with carefully selected refurbished vintage Polaroid internal components from the 80s and 90s. By reusing vintage components, we not only preserve the authentic instant photography experience but also promote sustainability by preventing electronic waste. Our meticulous refurbishment process ensures that every camera is thoroughly cleaned, serviced and tested to deliver a reliable instant photography experience.
90-day warranty:
Authentic Vintage, Guaranteed to Work
This camera has experienced decades of life before finding its way to OldieZone . As such, it will show some signs of past use and may vary ever so slightly from what is pictured. However, we are extremely picky about the condition of the cameras we restore and the parts we select for the repair process. The end result is an excellent vintage restoration that is guaranteed to work properly. Should any questions arise, we have a team of friendly people ready to help you.
This camera is covered by the OldieZone Refurbished guarantee. [view our 90-day limited warranty]

name: Philips AQ6691 Dynamic Bass Boost Portable Cassette Player
description:
Philips AQ6691 Dynamic Bass Boost Portable Cassette Player
4.793.000₫
Take a break from digital media and live in the moment with this blue portable cassette player. Fast-forward, rewind, flip the tape and watch it spin. Listen to an album all the way through while embracing the analog experience that is music on magnetic tape. There's also a built-in AM/FM radio!
This nostalgic piece has been expertly refurbished by our analog electronics gurus. This unit has new drive belts, a calibrated playback speed, a deoxidized volume potentiometer and a demagnetized tapehead. All components have been gingerly polished by our refurb technicians.
Please note this little player had an entire life before OldieZone . It will show signs of previous usage, but it is guaranteed to be working, clean and restored. Due to the refurbished nature of the product, the item you receive may show some light wear and vary slightly from what is pictured.
Contents include:
Philips AM/FM portable cassette player
Vintage-inspired orange foam headphones
AA batteries
User guide
What is vintage refurbished?
Every vintage item we restore has a story, and we take great care to preserve its authenticity. Our trained technicians carefully inspect, clean and service each piece, retaining original components whenever possible. When necessary, we incorporate high-quality replacement parts to ensure reliability and longevity. The result is a thoughtfully restored vintage item that’s fully functional and ready for a second life.
Please note vintage items will show signs of previous use. While we carefully restore each piece to ensure full functionality, cosmetic wear and slight variations from the product photos should be expected.

Retro-inspired headphones
Batteries

What Is Vintage Refurbished?
Our vintage refurbished players are professionally restored by a skilled team of technicians to ensure they perform like new while retaining their original charm. Each unit is carefully disassembled, inspected and cleaned. Key components such as drive belts, idler tires and pinch wheels are replaced, playback speed is calibrated, and the tapehead is cleaned and demagnetized. The volume potentiometer is deoxidized, and outer housings are polished for a clean finish.
Please note, these players have lived a full life before arriving at OldieZone and may show minor signs of previous use. However, every unit is guaranteed to be fully functional, clean and ready to deliver a reliable and authentic retro experience.

name: Sony Walkman TPS-L2 Portable Cassette Player with Case
description:
Sony Walkman TPS-L2 Portable Cassette Player with Case
26.750.000₫
In 1979, Sony changed how humans listen to music with their innovative Walkman series. For the first time ever, music was truly portable. The company's timeless designs are as iconic today as they were upon their release. This groundbreaking device features dual headphone jacks for shared listening, independent left and right channel volume controls and the signature ‘hotline’ button for quick communication without pausing your music. With its durable metal chassis and unmistakable blue and silver design, the TPS-L2 delivers an authentic vintage experience. Just pop in two AA batteries and you're ready for on-the-go listening!
The product you are purchasing is the product in the photos. Please review carefully for condition.

First introduced in 2001, the iPod is the quintessential MP3 player, and this 2nd generation Shuffle (2006) is the perfect blend of new millennium design with modern features in a tiny package.

Disassembling the iPod to its base components

name: Aiwa XP-V323YL Transparent Blue Portable CD Player
description:
Aiwa XP-V323YL Transparent Blue Portable CD Player
4.526.000₫
The Aiwa XP-V323YL is a portable CD player with a translucent blue lid and silver body, designed in the early 2000s for on-the-go listening. It supports CD-R and CD-RW playback and features a digital display for track and time information. Playback controls include skip/search, play mode and repeat, along with Aiwa’s DSL (Dynamic Super Linear Bass) function for enhanced low-end sound. A hold switch prevents accidental button presses, and a stereo headphone jack ensures private listening. Compact and lightweight, this model blends practical features with the colorful see-through design trend of the era.

name: Philips AJ3977/37 CD Clock Radio
description:
Philips AJ3977/37 CD Clock Radio
5.329.000₫
The Philips AJ3977/37 is a uniquely designed vertical CD clock radio released in the early 2000s. With its futuristic translucent blue casing, this unit features a front-loading CD player, digital clock with dual alarm functionality and built-in stereo speakers. The front panel includes a full set of buttons for tuning, volume, alarm modes and CD control, while the top LCD screen provides a clear time and track display. It supports CD-R/RW playback and includes a repeat alarm (snooze) feature for convenience. This model is a blend of Y2K-era design and practical bedside utility, offering both style and function in a compact form
Specs:
Brand: Philips
Model: AJ3977/37
Color: Silver
Power: 2x AA or wall outlet
Format: CD and radio
